game.name: Scary Cave Diving
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 패닉이 찾아왔을 때, 숨을 참을 수 있습니까? 심해 동굴 다이빙의 공포를 경험하세요. 절차적으로 생성되는 수중 동굴을 탐색하며, 최상위 포식자에게 쫓기면서 자원을 수집하고 생존을 위해 싸우세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Can you hold your breath when panic sets in? Experience the terror of deep-sea cave diving. Scavenge resources and fight to survive as you navigate procedurally generated underwater caves stalked by an apex predator!
